definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The algebraical equations obtained from the difference equations are solved by the line relaxation iterative method.
sentences.chinese: 差分方程形成的代數方程組用線鬆弛迭代求解。

sentences.english: Through the medium of walsh transform, the logical differential equation can be transformed into algebraic equation.
sentences.chinese: 通過沃爾什變換，邏輯微分方程能夠轉換爲代數方程。

sentences.english: The latter is concluded by Gauss's famous "Fundamental Theorem of Algebra".
sentences.chinese: 後者以高斯的“代數方程的基本定理”作爲結束。

sentences.english: This reduces the problem to the solution of an algebraic equation.
sentences.chinese: 這減少了問題的解決，一個代數方程。

sentences.english: This matrix defines the network algebraic equations.
sentences.chinese: 矩陣定義網路的代數方程。

sentences.english: EES can efficiently solve hundreds of coupled non-linear algebraic equations.
sentences.chinese: 它主要用於求解一系列的代數方程。
